description: Zak Spears oversees three blindfolded and leashed slaves - Clint Benedict, Devon Rexman and Chuck Barron - as they are flogged and spanked by henchmen Cliff Parker and Scott Davis...made to lick Colonel Spears boots for his own pleasure. Trent shows no mercy as evil commandant Zak eggs him on with brutal and dirty commands before directing the relentless fucker to shoot over Randall's ass.
